title: Non-Resolution Reasoning (NRR): A Computational Framework for Contextual Identity and Ambiguity Preservation
summary: Current AI systems exhibit a fundamental limitation: they resolve ambiguity prematurely. This premature semantic collapse--collapsing multiple valid interpretations into single outputs--stems from classical identity assumptions in neural architectures.
